p:
A6: Synthesis of ( E)-3-(thiophen-2″-yl)-1-[4′-(trifluoromethyl)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one: Yield: 80%; m.p. 86 °C; R
f = 0.76 (30% Ethyl acetate in Hexane); FT-IR (KBr, cm −1): 1658 (C=O), 1504 (CH=CH), 1614 (C=C Ar), 3121 (Ar C-H stretching), 1250 (-CF 3), 621 (C-S); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm): δ: 7.79 (1H, d, J = 16 Hz, -CO-CH=), 8.14 (1H, d, J = 16.2, 4.9 Ar-CH=), 7.80–8.12 (4H, m, C-2′, 3′, 5′, 6′, Ar-H), 7.17–7.77 (4H, m, C-3″, 4″, 5″, Ar-H); ESI-MS: 283.36 [M + H] +.
